name: Toy Adventurers: Beatdance
description: A masterpiece by Caron, owner of the Lepaute Horlogerie. This meticulously crafted clockwork toy was inspired by a certain adventurer. It is said that Caron infused his own experiences from his travels in Mondstadt into the making of this toy. Looking at this doll, one can recall that adventurous soul, who remained undeterred, smiling and giving a thumbs-up despite all the misfortunes they had endured. Caron hoped the toy could convey such courage and optimism to others, spreading inspiration far and wide...
